sections.heading: of Military Review; compensation
sections.text: Members of the Court of Military Review shall be paid the sum of fifty dollars per day when sitting and in addition shall be reimbursed for all expenses incurred as provided in sections 81-1174 to 81-1177 for state employees.SourceLaws 1969, c. 458, ยง 42, p. 1571;Law

55-442.Court of Military Review; compensation.

Members of the Court of Military Review shall be paid the sum of fifty dollars per day when sitting and in addition shall be reimbursed for all expenses incurred as provided in sections 81-1174 to 81-1177 for state employees.

SourceLaws 1969, c. 458, ยง 42, p. 1571;Laws 1981, LB 204, ยง 98.
